title: Macaulay Culkin
summary: Macaulay Macaulay Culkin Culkin[lower-alpha 1] (born Macaulay Carson Culkin; August 26, 1980 (1980-08-26))[1] is an American actor. Regarded as one of the most successful child actors of the 1990s,[2] he was placed 2nd on VH1's list of the "100 Greatest Kid-Stars".[3] He has been nominated for the MTV Movie Awards and Young Artist Awards.
